title: QRES: Neural Swarm Operating System
description: QRES is a decentralized operating system for edge AI swarms. It replaces state shipping with deterministic rematerialization, uses coordinate-wise trimmed mean aggregation for adversarial resilience, and employs BFP-16 arithmetic for precision on constrained hardware.
notes: Concept DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.18261441. Keep this as the repository DOI; papers use separate DOIs.
